Hello!

I am BEA MOLAR

Welcome to my portfolio! I am a Computer Science student with a passion for creating intuitive web applications. My interests include Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, and back-end development. Join me as I explore and innovate in the digital space.

ABOUT ME

Hey there! I'm Bea Rina Molar, straight from the coastal vibes of San Juan, Hilongos, Leyte. Living by the beach was great, but my real passion was diving into the world of futuristic tech! Even as a kid, I was fascinated by all the amazing possibilities that technology could offer.

Right now, I'm focusing on being practical and honing my skills in web development. Gotta start somewhere, right? But deep down, I've got this big dream of working on a major tech innovation somedayâ€”something that can really make an impact. Just taking it one step at a time!
